description: This is a market group over what Karine Jean-Pierre will say at the White House Press Briefing scheduled for December 10, 2024.

markets.description:
Karine Jean-Pierre is currently scheduled to give press briefing on December 10 at 2:00 PM ET. This market pertains to the opening statement as well as any following Q&A session. You can watch this briefing here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2-suJBz351c

This market will resolve to "Yes" if KJP says "Syria" 3 or more times during the White House press briefing. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market. 

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "Syria" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to the country in the Middle East.

If no such press briefing happens by December 17, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be video and transcripts of the press briefing.
markets.question: Will KJP say "Syria" 3 or more times during press briefing?

markets.description:

This market will resolve to "Yes" if KJP says "president" 15 or more times during the White House press briefing. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be video and transcripts of the press briefing.
